title: Matplotlib Custom Tickels
description: Matplotlib is a popular Python library used for data visualization. One of the key features of Matplotlib is the ability to customize the tick labels on a plot. In this lab, you will learn how to rotate custom tick labels using Matplotlib.

meta.title: Customizing Matplotlib Tick Labels
meta.description: Learn how to rotate custom tick labels using the popular Python data visualization library Matplotlib.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, data visualization, custom labels, tick labels
